Package io.sf.carte.doc.agent

User agent classes.

To compute styles with a minimum of accuracy, the library needs to use several user agent-related abstractions. Those interfaces and classes are intended to make easier integrating the library with a range of use cases.

If you do not want to compute styles, you do not need to use anything in this package (unless you wish to use this infrastructure to retrieve documents and style sheets). On the other hand, if you want accurate style computations you need to write implementations of DeviceFactory, CSSCanvas and StyleDatabase adequate for your use case. You can compute styles without them, but the results may be less accurate.

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationCredentials
    Authentication credentials for user agents.
    Cookie  
    CookieConfig
    User agent configuration for http cookies.
    CSSCanvas
    CSS canvas interface.
    DeviceFactory
    Device factory.
    OriginPolicy
    Origin policy.
    UserAgent
    Very basic user agent abstraction.
    UserAgent.AgentControl
    User agent configuration and control.
    UserAgentErrorHandler
    Handles errors that the user agent finds.
    Viewport
    Represents a viewport defined as per the CSS specifications.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AbstractDeviceFactory
    A simple, map-backed abstract base class for DeviceFactory implementations.
    AbstractUserAgent
    Abstract base class for User Agents, with cookie handling.
    AgentUtil
    User agent utility methods.
    DefaultCookie
    Default Cookie implementation.
    HeadlessDeviceFactory
    Device factory for headless devices.
    LogUserAgentErrorHandler  
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    IllegalOriginException
